info.description:
## About Management - UserManagement
This service contains actions for working with clients and user registration for fintech sandbox.
info.title: Management API

post.description: Used to register a Client, so the authorization server will recognize and correctly redirect tokens back to the solution.

parameters.description: The descriptive but unique identifier for this client.
parameters.name: clientId

parameters.description: Used to send a valid subscription key.
parameters.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

get.description: Returns the Jwt token to use with RBs API services.

parameters.description: Used to send a valid subscription key.
parameters.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

post.description: Makes it possible to get a new test user to use in the Fintech party sandbox. Note down the username and password, as it will not be shown again. The ClientID must be registered first.

parameters.description: The descriptive but unique identifier for this client.
parameters.name: clientId

parameters.description: Used to send a valid subscription key.
